name: SportsBattle - Fantasy Sports
description:
Fantasy Football, Basketball, Baseball, Cricket, Soccer & much more.

SportsBattle: The new fantasy sports app with easy to play game formats. Over-Under, Player-Battle & Daily contests

Say hello to new fantasy sports destination to play fantasy cricket, soccer and basketball for real money. With a suite of games including over-under, player-battle & daily contests, you'll never need to play anywhere else again.

Why you will love SportsBattle:

• No need to worry about competing against millions of users to win. Just beat our over-under predictions and win. It is that simple
• No need to setup 100s of lineups. Just select players who thinks will score points and win the player-battle.
• Forget about pros with advanced algorithms flooding contests you'll never win
• World class customer service to help you with any issue that may arise with in-app support chat.
• Easy to deposit.
• Simple, free, and unlimited withdrawals.


US residents only. Users must be 18 or older (19 or older in Alabama, 21 or older in Massachusetts). Users physically located in AZ, DE, ID, HI, IA, LA, MT, NV, and WA are not eligible to participate in cash contests. Users must be 18 or older. Users physically located in AK, AR, CA, CO, CT, DC, FL, GA, IL, KY, MI, MN, NE, NM, NC, ND, OK, OR, RI, SC, SD, TX, UT, WV, WI, WY are eligible to participate in paid contests.

https://sportsbattleapp.com/termsofuse.html
https://sportsbattleapp.com/PrivacyPolicy.html

Disclaimer: All the contests are only affiliated with Onecricket Fantasy Inc. The contests types were decided over months of user research, user testing and user feedback after trying out variety of contests. All the team images are created in-house or either received using proper copyrights and credits provided. Visit the credits section under Other in the app for more information. Visit https://sportsbattleapp.com for more information. If you have any questions/suggestions, just drop us a note on the in-app support chat

We are not associated with any local, national or international sports organizations/boards or teams. All the data displayed in the app related to leagues, schedule, player profiles, player points, scores, etc. is generated using Onecricket Fantasy Inc assets and not retrieved using any third parties. Onecricket Fantasy Inc owns complete ownership of the data.
